Articles.Content: I'm new and I suck at rocket building can someone share a screenshot or give me tips? Thanks!

You might want to check out this section of the forums: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/forums/54-Tutorials

I'm sure you'll find some help there.

Hi! I have some tips on how to build a simple rocket!

1. Pick a command pod (If you like it manned)

2. Attach an ASAS Module beneath it.

3. Attach 2-3 Rockomax X200-32 Fuel Tanks.

4. Attach a LV-T45/LV-T30/Mainsail/Poodle or a Skipper under it.

5. Attach 3-4 LT-2 Landing struts symmetrically by pressing X.

6. Last but not least, attach a Mk16-XL Parachute on top of the command pod.

Hope this helps!

Edited March 20, 2014 by Xaelath
The picture didn't appear. Edit 2,3,4,5,6, 24: Still not appearing. Edit 25: Now it shows up! Thanks, MartGonzo and Taki117!
Just practice strapping different type of engines to stacks of fuel tanks. Been playing for like 2 months and all I can say is Trial and Error - or Youtube
